page.title: 08Royal Air Force,Uxbridge.
page.content: Royal Air Force Uxbridge is based on the Hillingdon rd,near Uxbridge town centre.The camp was set up in 1917 and is one of the oldest R.A.F.Stations. It is the home of the Queen's Colour Squadron which guards the Queen and the Royal Family at Royal palaces. It also guards foreign presidents and other important visitors,and performs each year in a ceremony of music.It is the headquarters of the National Air Traffic Service and has information on all the civilian and military aircraft flying over the country.There is an underground American Air Base which is top secret and is a telecommunications base for all over the world.
